definition: down/downwards/below/lower/later/next (week etc)/second (of two parts)/to decline/to go down/to arrive at (a decision, conclusion etc)/measure word to show the frequency of an action
individual/this/that/size/classifier for people or objects in general
a period of time/phase/stage/classifier for issues of a periodical, courses of study/time/term/period/to hope/Taiwan pr. [qi2]

sentences.english: Liverpool are trying to thrash out a deal with Real Madrid to land Ruud van Nistelrooy on a six-month loan next week.
sentences.chinese: 利物浦正在嘗試與皇馬討論下個星期租借範尼六個月。

sentences.english: A new system of taxation will come into effect next Monday.
sentences.chinese: 新稅法體系將於下個星期一開始實施。

sentences.english: I'm afraid I can't come. I'm booked up all next week.
sentences.chinese: 恐怕我來不了，下個星期我完全沒有空。

sentences.english: Han Mei is going to play volleyball next Wednesday afternoon.
sentences.chinese: 韓梅打算下個星期三下午去打排球。
歸還期限是下個星期三。

sentences.english: C:He’ll be six next Sunday. The toy is for his birthday.
sentences.chinese: 下個星期天他就六歲了，玩具是作爲他的生日禮物。

sentences.english: Uncle Judy said he would give us his decision for certain next week.
sentences.chinese: 朱狄叔叔說了，他下個星期一定給我們作出決定。

sentences.english: I was wondering if we could postpone the appoint till next Sunday.
sentences.chinese: 我想知道我們是否可以把約會推到下個星期天。

sentences.english: The court adjourned from Friday until Monday.
sentences.chinese: 法庭從星期五休庭至下個星期一。

sentences.english: Can you water my plants next week?
sentences.chinese: 下個星期能幫我給植物澆一下水嗎？

sentences.english: Next week, our school will go on an autumn outing.
sentences.chinese: 我們學校下個星期要去秋遊。

sentences.english: I was cerebration abender next Tuesday.
P S. I meet another birthday next week and will hit 85.
sentences.chinese: 下個星期我過生日，我85歲了。
